description: The AWS::SSM::Association resource associates an SSM document in AWS Systems Manager with EC2 instances that contain a configuration agent to process the document.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Values.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]{1,128}$|resource-groups:Name  
Update requires: No interruption

Target.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

S3KeyPrefix.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Region.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 20  
Update requires: No interruption

S3OutputLocation.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceAssociationOutputLocation.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ParameterValues.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Update requires: No interruption

AssociationName.markdownDescription:
The name of the association.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-.]{3,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

CalendarNames.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ScheduleExpression.description: A Cron or Rate expression that specifies when the association is applied to the target.
ScheduleExpression.markdownDescription:
A Cron or Rate expression that specifies when the association is applied to the target.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxErrors.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,6}|[0]|[1-9][0-9]%|[0-9]%|100%)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Parameters.description: Parameter values that the SSM document uses at runtime.
Parameters.markdownDescription:
Parameter values that the SSM document uses at runtime.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceId.description: The ID of the instance that the SSM document is associated with.
InstanceId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the instance that the SSM document is associated with.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: (^i-(\w{8}|\w{17})$)|(^mi-\w{17}$)  
Update requires: No interruption

WaitForSuccessTimeoutSeconds.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxConcurrency.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,6}|[1-9][0-9]%|[1-9]%|100%)$  
Update requires: No interruption

ComplianceSeverity.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CRITICAL | HIGH | MEDIUM | LOW | UNSPECIFIED  
Update requires: No interruption

Targets.description: The targets that the SSM document sends commands to.
Targets.markdownDescription:
The targets that the SSM document sends commands to.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

SyncCompliance.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTO | MANUAL  
Update requires: No interruption

ScheduleOffset.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the SSM document.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the SSM document.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-.:/]{3,200}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ApplyOnlyAtCronInterval.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

DocumentVersion.description: The version of the SSM document to associate with the target.
DocumentVersion.markdownDescription:
The version of the SSM document to associate with the target.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ([$]LATEST|[$]DEFAULT|^[1-9][0-9]*$)  
Update requires: No interruption

AutomationTargetParameterName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 50  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationId.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier of the association.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption
